page.title: 14Leisure Facilities
page.content: The Williams family made avalible 21 acres at Pendley for sports clubs including football,rugby,bowls,squash and lacrosse.Tennis,hockey and cricket clubs have grounds in Station Road, which sees an annual John Player league match.Tring school has a fine indoor swimming pool,and alongside it a splendid multi-purpose sports centre opened in 1983.Both are avalible for public use.within easy reach of several golf courses including Ashridge,Woburn and Chiltern forest while gliding is avalible at Dunstable a huge range of other interests is catered for by clubs and societies.Here are some of them:floral art,choral,dance,music,vale gilbert and sullivan,silver band,Tring orchestra,camera club,A.R.T at Pendley Junior theatre,phoenix amateur dramatic.
